title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 5
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: A hat, a loving mum, a family background, a novel and Tigger
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Karen's hat; Lyn from Port Melbourne has three 'favourite' children; David from Endeavour Hills' favourite things include his family heritage and his novel; and Erica from Melbourne introduces us to Tigger.
